  • Method Details

    • getAllCourses

      public List<Course> getAllCourses()
      Retrieves all courses.
      Returns:
      List of all courses.

    • getCourseById

      public Course getCourseById(int courseId)
      Retrieves a course by ID.
      Parameters:
      courseId - ID of the wanted course.
      Returns:
      Course with the specified iD.

    • hasAvailableSpots

      public boolean hasAvailableSpots(int courseId)
      Checks if the specified course has available spots.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course to check.
      Returns:
      true if the course exists and has available spots, false otherwise.

    • sortCoursesByAvailableSlots

      public List<Course> sortCoursesByAvailableSlots()
      Sorts the list of courses based on their available slots in ascending order. The available slots are calculated as the difference between the maximum capacity and the current capacity of the course.
      Returns:
      A list of courses sorted by the number of available slots in ascending order.

    • sortCoursesByMinAge

      public List<Course> sortCoursesByMinAge()
      Sorts the list of courses based on their minimum age requirement in ascending order. This method helps users identify courses appropriate for specific age groups.
      Returns:
      A list of courses sorted by the minimum age requirement in ascending order.
